title: Number of visitors to Zion National Park in the U.S. 2008 to 2019
summary: Overall Number of visitors in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of visitors in millions is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016, and finally roughly constant from 2016 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Number of visitors in millions, of value 4.5 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Number of visitors in millions about 3.19 was reached at Year 2014
min_summary: In general Number of visitors in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of visitors in millions is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016, and finally roughly constant from 2016 to 2019.
